branding.tagline: Every event has a past. We explore it.

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Event origins, causes of historical events
publishing_focus.target_audience: Readers interested in the 'why' behind historical events
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Past Prologue delves into the often overlooked origins of historical events
publishing_focus.example_titles: Books on the causes of World Wars, the origins of revolutions
